title: Warwick glitch?
body: Is warwicks W passive (or active), supposed to have its benefits turn off when you become slowed? Every time I get nailed by anything with MS debuff I go from 600+ MS back to 370 until the slow effect is gone.

replies.body: Nothing sounds out of the ordinary to me.  Even though his movement speed increases, it doesn't make him immune from snares or CC.  If you have feedback about this, let the community and devs know through our [gameplay ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance)boards.  Hope that helps clear things up, awooo! :D

Hello Porocles.

I also made a thread about his W being glitched but not on this way.

When you die and you revive in your base, if any enemy is below 50% hp your W passive will NOT activate: it will need to be hit again.

I have been asking for this since the rework came out but i had no answer.

Thank you for your attention.
